Title: Slam
Writer: Nick Hornby (novel), Francesco Bruni (screenplay), Ludovica Rampoldi (screenplay), Andrea Molaioli (screenplay)
Actors: Ludovico Tersigni, Barbara Ramella, Jasmine Trinca, Luca Marinelli
Plot: Teen father-to-be Sam imagines his future as a young parent and finds a surprising mentor while reading about his idol, pro skateboarder Tony Hawk.
